page.title: 06EDUCTN PUPILL NOS AND SEX
page.content: THE NO. OF PUPILS: Our school is called Cefn Coch, it is in Penrhyndeudraeth. There are seven classes in the school. There are three infant classes and four junior classes. Altogether there are 129 pupils, 57 in the infants and 72 in the junior clases. There are 78 boys and 51 girls. The senior upils are going to the following comprehensive schools in Sept. 85; Ysgol Ardudwy, Harlech - 13 pupils, Ysgol Eifionydd, Porthmadog - 3 pupils, and Ysgol y Moelwyn, Blaenau Ffestiniog - 1 pupil.
